name: object_detection
template: urisourcebin uri="{source[uri]}" ! concat name=c ! decodebin ! video/x-raw ! videoconvert name="videoconvert" ! gvadetect model="{models[object_detection][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[object_detection][1][proc]}" name="detection" ! gvametaconvert converter=json method=detection source="{source[uri]}" name="jsonmetaconvert" ! gvametapublish method="{destination[type]}" address="{destination[host]}" clientid="{tags[algorithm]}" topic="{destination[topic]}" timeout=1000 ! queue ! appsink name=appsink
